Oops... I accidentally hit some key that sent the bug too early; I meant to add some more information:

- the Eclipse version is 3.1.0, build I20050627-1435
- the problem is not always reproducible; apparently it depends on some trigger in the workbench state
- the project on which the problem occurred does not have any build errors
- the bug might be related to bug 131921

This is fixed in 3.2. We now make sure that the scope is not null.
In 3.2 you would get null and not a NPE.
Closing as WORKSFORME.
